definition_en: The name of the Latin script letter A/a.
example: I need a book. / 私は一冊の本が必要です。

definition_en: Easy to use.
example: She's able to speak three languages fluently. / 彼女は3つの言語を流暢に話すことができる。

definition_en: Moving around; astir.
example: I'm writing about my trip to Japan. / 私は、日本に行った旅について書きます。

definition_en: Something done, a deed.
meanings_ja: 演技 (in a dramatic or theatrical sense)
example: I'll act on your suggestion. / 私はあなたの提案に乗ります。

definition_en: An act or instance of adding.
meanings_ja: 合わせる (in mathematics or computer programming)
example: I need to add 2 + 2. / 2+2を加える必要があります。

definition_en: Later; second (of two); next, following, subsequent
example: I'll see you after the meeting. / 会議終わるまでに会いましょう。

definition_en: Another time; once more.
meanings_ja: 新しく、もう一回 (for "to do something again" or "once more")
example: I'll try again. / もう一度 Attemptする。

definition_en: Gone; gone by; gone away; passed; passed away.
example: I knew her five years ago. / 私は彼女を5年前知っていた。

definition_en: To harmonize in opinion, statement, or action; to be in unison or concord; to be or become united or consistent; to concur.
meanings_ja: 合意をとる, 了承する
example: "I agree to meet you at 5pm." / "私たちは5時に会うことに同意します。"

definition_en: (with a possessive pronoun) Everything that one is capable of.
meanings_ja: すべての, 何者も無い
example: I love all the books in this library. / 私はこの図書館にある全ての本を愛します。

definition_en: In company; together.
meanings_ja: 並ぶ (in a line or sequence)
example: I'm going to walk along the beach tomorrow. / 明日浜辺で散歩するつもりです。

definition_en: Prior to some specified time, either past, present, or future; by this time; previously.
example: I've already eaten breakfast. / 朝食はもう食べた。

definition_en: (focus) In addition; besides; as well; further; too.
meanings_ja: 同じく, その他のことも
example: I like reading books, also movies. / 私は本を読むことが好きです、また映画も。

definition_en: At all times; throughout all time; since the beginning.
example: I will always be here for you. / 君がいてくれることを常に信じている。

definition_en: Before noon.
example: I am going to be late. / 私は遅刻する。

definition_en: One
example: I need an umbrella. / umbrellaが必要です。

definition_en: In rhythm, the second half of a divided beat.
example: I like reading books and watching movies. / 私は本を読み、映画を見ているの。

definition_en: An additional one of the same kind.
example: I'll have another cup of coffee. / 私はもう一杯のコーヒーを飲みます。

definition_en: A response or reply; something said or done in reaction to a statement or question.
example: What's your answer to this question? / この質問の返答は何ですか?

definition_en: A response or reply; something said or done in reaction to a statement or question.
meanings_ja: 回答 (in a test or examination)
example: What are your answers to these questions? / これらの質問に対するあなたの解答は何ですか？

definition_en: To even the slightest extent, at all.
meanings_ja:
I'm happy to help! 😊

meaning 1: 何者でも
meaning 2: どんなものもない

example: Any book is good for reading. / 何の本も読むのに適しています。

(Note: The main meanings of "any" are "whatever" and "not specified". In Japanese, "何者でも" represents the former, while "" represents the latter.)

definition_en: Any one out of an indefinite number of persons; anyone; any person.
example: Would you like to go out tonight? Anybody want to join us! / 今晩出かねばいいですか？誰も来たい人いますね！

definition_en: Any person; anybody.
meanings_ja: みんな、誰も (general meaning, including unknown or unspecified individuals)
example: Anyone can enter the contest. / みんなが参加できるコンクールです。

definition_en: Someone or something of importance.
example: Do you have anything to eat? / 食べ物があるのあるかね?

definition_en: An accepted (but deprecated and rarely used) SI unit of area equal to 100 square metres, or a former unit of approximately the same extent. Symbol: a.
example: They are friends. / 彼らは友達です。

definition_en: (with the verb "to be") Present in the vicinity.
meanings_ja: そこに、そばに (indicating physical proximity)
example: I'll meet you around 5 o'clock. / 5時ぐらいに会おう。

definition_en: To such an extent or degree; to the same extent or degree.
example: I'll do it as soon as I finish my homework. / 私はhomeworkを終わすまでは何もしない。

definition_en: An act or instance of asking.
meanings_ja: 強調する (in the sense of "to ask for something in a strong manner")
example: Can I ask you to help me? / 私はあなたに助けていただきたいと訊きます。

definition_en: To request (information, or an answer to a question).
example: I asked her to marry me. / 私は彼女に結婚してくれないかと訊きました。

definition_en: To reply to or talk to someone, either online or face-to-face. (from the practice of targeting a message or reply to someone online by writing @name)
example: I'll meet you at the station. / スタジオで会いましょう。

definition_en: To depart; to go to another place.
example: I'm going away on vacation. / 私は休暇に出発する。

definition_en: The rear of the body, especially the part between the neck and the end of the spine and opposite the chest and belly.
example: The athlete had a back injury. / アスリートは背中の怪我を持っていました。

definition_en: Error, mistake.
example: The weather was bad today. / 今日は悪天候でした。

definition_en: A solid or hollow sphere, or roughly spherical mass.
meanings_ja: ボール（スポーツグッズ）
example: The ball is rolling down the hill. / ボールは丘の上を転がっている。
I will be a teacher. / 私は教師になる。

definition_en: Someone who is beautiful. Can be used as a term of address.
example: The sunset on the beach was beautiful. / そのビーチでの日没は美しい。

definition_en: The quality of being (especially visually) attractive, pleasing, fine or good-looking; comeliness.
example: She has a natural beauty. / 彼女は自然の美しさを持つ。

definition_en: For the reason (that).
example: I'm going to the party because it's my birthday. / 私はパーティーに行くが、誕生日だから。

definition_en: To arrive, come (to a place).
example: I will become a doctor when I graduate. / 私は卒業したら医師になる。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
example: I have been to Tokyo several times. /私は幾度か東京にいています。

definition_en: At an earlier time.
example: I'll meet you before the movie starts. / 映画が始まる前に会う。

definition_en: The rear, back-end
example: I'm behind you in this project. / このプロジェクトではあなたに続いています。

definition_en: To accept as true, particularly without absolute certainty (i.e., as opposed to knowing)
meanings_ja: 扱う、尊ぶ (in a broader sense, to have faith in someone or something)
example: I believe in myself. / 私は自分自身に信じてる。

definition_en: The supreme effort one can make, or has made.
meanings_ja: 優秀な, 一番優れている
example: The best way to get there is by car. / 車で行くのが一番良い方法です。

definition_en: An entity, usually animate, deemed superior to another; one who has a claim to precedence; a superior.
meanings_ja: 最良の状態 (this is one of the most common meanings)
example: I think we can make this product better. / これらの製品を上回すことができます。

definition_en: A kind of needle, shorter than a sharp, with a small rounded eye, used for making fine stitches on heavy fabrics.
example: I'm between jobs, looking for a new opportunity. / 自分は就職しているが、新しい仕事を探しています。

definition_en: Someone or something that is large in stature
meanings_ja:
I'm happy to help! 📚

大: [大]

* 大きい: something large in size or amount
* 重大: important or significant

例文: The big game is today. / 今日のビッグゲームはあります。

Note: In this dictionary, I've only listed the most common meanings of the word "big".
example: The big game is today. / 今日のビッグゲームはあります。

definition_en: Of great size, large.
example: The new car is bigger than the old one. / 新しい車は古い車よりも大きい。

definition_en: A piece of metal placed in a horse's mouth and connected to the reins to direct the animal.
example: I ate a bit of the cake. / 私はカケの一小さな部分を食べました。

definition_en: Physical frame.
meanings_ja: 構成、組織 (as in "the body of the organization")
example: The doctor examined my body for any injuries. / 医者は私の身体を検診した。

definition_en: A collection of sheets of paper bound together to hinge at one edge, containing printed or written material, pictures, etc.
meanings_ja: 記録 (in computer science, a book can refer to a collection of data or programs)
example: I'm reading a great book about history. / 私は歴史についてのいい書籍を読んでいます。

definition_en: Deviation of the path of a rolling ball from a straight line; slope; slant.
meanings_ja: 借りる (in a financial or formal sense)
example: I'm going to borrow my friend's car for the weekend. / 私は友達の車を貸し借りして週末に使う。

definition_en: Each of the two, or of the two kinds.
meanings_ja: また (in a more casual context)
example: I like both coffee and tea. / 私はコーヒーとお茶を両方好きです。

definition_en: A construction or natural feature that spans a divide.
example: The new bridge will connect the two cities. / 新しい枚道は二つの都市を接続します。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To transport toward somebody/somewhere.
example: I will bring a gift to my friend's birthday party. / 私は友達の誕生日パーティーにプレゼントを持ってくる。

definition_en: Son of the same parents as another person.
example: My older brother is very tall. / わたしの兄はとても高い。

definition_en: The physique of a human body; constitution or structure of a human body.
meanings_ja: 成立する, 構築する
example: I will build a new house. / 私は新しい家を建てる。

definition_en: The act or process by which something is built; construction.
meanings_ja: 建造物 (in a broader sense, including structures)
example: The new building on 5th Avenue is impressive. / 5番街の新しい建物は印象的です。

definition_en: A specific commercial enterprise or establishment.
meanings_ja: 仕事 (a more general term for business or occupation)
example: I started my own business in Tokyo. / 東京で自分の事業を始めた。

definition_en: An instance or example of using the word "but".
meanings_ja: ただし, また (when indicating a contrast or exception)
example: I wanted to go to the party, but it was raining. / 私はパーティーに行きたいと思っていたが、雨だった。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
example: The company was founded by John Smith. / ジョン・スミスによって会社が設立された。

definition_en: Abbreviation of circa.
example: The company's name starts with a C. / その会社名は「C」で始まる。

definition_en: A telephone conversation.
meanings_ja: 招集する, 呼びかける
example: I got a call from my friend. / 友達から電話がありました。

definition_en: (heading) To use one's voice.
meanings_ja: 名称される (in a formal or official sense)
example: The company was called XYZ Inc. / その会社はXYZインコーと呼ばれる。

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
meanings_ja: ボトル缶（缶詰） - This refers to a tin or metal container used for packaging food and drinks.
パソコンの起動可能 - In the context of computers, "can" can mean that a computer is able to start up or boot.
example: I can speak some Japanese. / 私は少々日本語を話すことができます。

definition_en: Something that cannot be done.
example: I cannot speak Japanese. / 私は日本語が話せません。

definition_en: Grief, sorrow.
example: I'll take care of the baby. / 私は赤ちゃんを世話します。

definition_en: An actual event, situation, or fact.
example: The police investigated a serious case of fraud. /警察は大きな詐欺の事件を調査しました。

definition_en: A single-room dwelling for a hermit.
example: The cell is the basic unit of life. / 生命の基本単位は細胞です。

definition_en: A series of interconnected rings or links usually made of metal.
example: I got a ch in my job interview. / 私は職員 면접でチャンスを掴んだ。

definition_en: An opportunity or possibility.
example: I got a chance to meet my favorite celebrity. / 私は自分のファンサイトのスターと出会う機会を持った。

definition_en: The process of becoming different.
example: I want to make some changes in my life. / 私は、自分の生活に変化をもたらすことを欲しています。

definition_en: The plant Smilax china, a liana of much of eastern Asia.
example: I bought a beautiful china vase. / 私は美しい中国の花瓶を買いました。

definition_en: An option; a decision; an opportunity to choose or select something.
example: I have no choice but to accept the offer. / 私には選択の余地がないため、オファーを受けなければならない。

definition_en: To pick; to make the choice of; to select.
example: I chose to study abroad. / 私は留学したいと選んだ。

definition_en: A large settlement, bigger than a town; sometimes with a specific legal definition, depending on the place.
example: Tokyo is one of the world's greatest cities. / 東京は世界最高の都市の一つです。

definition_en: A group, collection, category or set sharing characteristics or attributes.
meanings_ja: 学級 (Gaku-kyuu) - a group of students in a school
社会階層 (Shakai-kai-sei) - a group of people with similar social status or position
example: The new student was placed in my class. / 私の学級に、新しい学生が加わった。

definition_en: A group, collection, category or set sharing characteristics or attributes.
meanings_ja: 集会、クラス (社会的集団)
example: I have classes on Tuesdays and Thursdays. / 火曜日と木曜日に学科があります。

definition_en: Removal of dirt.
example: The new smartphone has a clean interface that's easy to use. / 新スマートフォンは、使いやすくて簡潔なインターフェースを持ちます。

definition_en: (of a thing) Having a low temperature.
example: It's cold outside. / outsideは寒い。

definition_en: The spectral composition of visible light
example: The color of the sunset was breathtaking. / 黄昏の色は breathtakingでした。

definition_en: The spectral composition of visible light
meanings_ja: 調子（主に音楽や絵画などで使用）
example: The painting used a wide range of colors to create a vibrant effect. / その絵画は多くの色彩を組み合わせて生々しい効果を出した。

definition_en: Coming, arrival; approach.
example: "The answer comes from the data." / "データから答えが見つかる"

definition_en: To move from further away to nearer to.
meanings_ja: 起こす (to cause something to happen)
example: The train comes every hour. / 列車は每時到着する。

definition_en: To move from further away to nearer to.
meanings_ja: その方向に移動している
example: The new employee is coming. / 新しい社員が近い将来着任します。

definition_en: Mutual good, shared by more than one.
example: The company has a common goal to increase sales. / その会社は売り上げを増やす一般的な目標を持つ。

definition_en: A team; a group of people who work together professionally.
example: The company is hiring new employees. / 企業は新しい従業員を採用しています。

definition_en: A person employed to perform computations; one who computes.
meanings_ja: 電子計算機 (in a broader sense)
example: I use my computer to check email. / 私は電子メールをチェックするためにコンピューターを使う。

definition_en: A person employed to perform computations; one who computes.
meanings_ja: 電子計算機、パーソナルコンピューター (for personal computers)
example: I bought a new computer to play games. / ゲームを遊ぶために新しいコンピューターを購入しました。

definition_en: A moderate or refreshing state of cold; moderate temperature of the air between hot and cold; coolness.
meanings_ja: すごく寒い (in a cold sense)
example: The beer was cool and refreshing. / ビールはしんきないで、リフレッシュした。

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
example: I could run a marathon if I trained harder. / 私はより練習したらマラソンを走ることができます。

definition_en: (chiefly British) An area of land; a district, region.
example: The countries around the world are working together to address climate change. / 世界の各国家が気候変化に対応するために協力しています。

definition_en: A sequence of events.
example: I'm taking a course in Japanese. / 私は日本語のクラスを受けている。

definition_en: To bring into existence; (sometimes in particular:)
example: The company will create a new product line. / その会社は新製品ラインを作ります。

definition_en: Abbreviation of declare.
example: It's not d to solve this problem. / これは解決するのにできません。

definition_en: The fruit of the date palm, Phoenix dactylifera, somewhat in the shape of an olive, containing a soft, sweet pulp and enclosing a hard kernel.
example: What's our date tonight? / こんばんは何時ですか?

definition_en: Any period of 24 hours.
example: The best day for a picnic is on Sunday. / 日曜日にピクニックは最高です。

definition_en: Any period of 24 hours.
example: I'm going to spend my days at the beach. / 海辺で日々を過ごす plan がある。

definition_en: (with "the") The deep part of a lake, sea, etc.
example: The deep ocean is full of mysteries. / 深い海は謎に満ちている。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
meanings_ja: した、果たした (in formal or written contexts)
example: I did my homework yesterday. /昨日は宿題をやりました。

meanings_ja: なぜか、理由は (indicating a reason or explanation)
example: "I didn't go to the party because I was tired." / 「パーティに行くのは疲れたから行かなかった。」

definition_en: The different ideal.
example: The company has different policies for employees and customers. / 会社は従業員と客に対して異なるポリシーを持っています。

definition_en: To make difficult; to impede; to perplex.
example: The exam was difficult, but I passed it. / 試験は難しかったけど通った。

definition_en: A party, celebration, social function.
example: I will do my homework tonight. /私は今夜宿題をやる。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
example: What does she do for fun? / 彼女は何を趣味でやるの？
She doesn't like coffee. / 彼女はコーヒー好きじゃない。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
meanings_ja: 行為を始める、活動を継続
example: I'm doing my homework. / 私は宿題をしてます。

definition_en: A university professor, particularly one at Oxford or Cambridge.
example: The coach donned the championship trophy. / コーチはチャンピオンシップトロフィーを与えた。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
meanings_ja: 手伝った, やり尽くされた
example: I've finished my homework. / 私の宿題はできました。

definition_en: A negative aspect; a downer.
meanings_ja: 下り、降下 (e.g. down the stairs)
example: I'm feeling down today. / 私は今日は鬱気でいる。

definition_en: The result of a contest that neither side has won; a tie.
meanings_ja: 画す（to create a picture or diagram）
引き継ぐ（to follow or continue something, such as a trend or a task）
example: I need to draw the stairs carefully so I don't make any mistakes. / スタイルを描く必要があり、間違いを避けるため。

definition_en: A shift (scheduled work period) that takes place early in the day.
example: I have to finish this project early tomorrow. / 明日早くこのプロジェクトを完了する必要があります。

definition_en: Something that is easy
meanings_ja: 箴やすい (for physical or mental tasks)
example: This math problem is easy. / これらの数学問題はやさしい。

definition_en: (used only with indefinite or interrogative pronouns) Other; in addition to previously mentioned items.
example: If I hadn't studied hard, I would have failed the exam. Otherwise, what else could I do? / もう学習してなければ、試験に落ちてしまった。さあ、それ以外何ができるのか？

definition_en: The terminal point of something in space or time.
meanings_ja: 最後, 決定, 実際
example: The meeting will end at 5pm. / 会議は17時まで続きます。

definition_en: Sufficiently.
meanings_ja: พอす (in certain contexts, such as indicating that someone is satisfied or happy)
example: I have enough money to buy this gift. / この贈り物を買うのに十分な金があります。

definition_en: The "Enter" key on a computer keyboard.
meanings_ja: 参加する, 登録する
example: I will enter the competition. / 私は競争に参加します。

meanings_ja: 各自の, それぞれの
example: I meet every friend I have. / 私は友人全員と会う。

definition_en: All the things under discussion.
meanings_ja: そのあらゆる部分 (if referring to a specific situation or context)
example: The teacher explained everything about the assignment. / その課題について全て説明した。

definition_en: Something that is representative of all such things in a group.
example: This is an example of a successful project. /这是一个成功项目的例子。

definition_en: Any activity designed to develop or hone a skill or ability.
meanings_ja: 練習 (in a sports or academic context)
example: I need to exercise every day to stay healthy. / 私は日々健康を保持するために運動を必要としています。

definition_en: To make plain, manifest, or intelligible; to clear of obscurity; to illustrate the meaning of.
meanings_ja: 理解する (this meaning is less common than the first one, but still exists)
example: Can you explain the rules of the game? / ゲームのルールを説明してください。

definition_en: An organ through which animals see (perceive surroundings via light).
example: The doctor examined my eye to check for any problems. / 医者は私の瞳を検査して問題があるか確認した。

definition_en: The front part of the head of a human or other animal, featuring the eyes, nose and mouth, and the surrounding area.
example: She put on a happy face to hide her sadness. / она надела счастливое лицо, чтобы скрыть свою печаль.

definition_en: Something actual as opposed to invented.
meanings_ja: 確実な情報 (in scientific or technical contexts)
example: The scientist presented a surprising fact about the new species. / 科学者は、新しい種について驚くべき事実を発表した。

definition_en: A hand-held device consisting of concertinaed material, or slats of material, gathered together at one end, that may be opened out into the shape of a sector of a circle and waved back and forth in order to move air towards oneself and cool oneself.
meanings_ja: スタイルのなさしい人
example: She's a big fan of rock music. / 彼女はロックミュージックが大好きです。

definition_en: Distant; remote in space.
meanings_ja: 甚だ (used to emphasize the degree or extent)
example: The hotel is far from the city center. / ホテルは市中心から遠い。

definition_en: A train that calls at only some stations it passes between its origin and destination, typically just the principal stations
meanings_ja: 急いで、急に (in a hurry, suddenly)
example: I need to get home quickly. / 私は急いで家に帰りたい。

definition_en: A quality of an object experienced by touch.
meanings_ja: 感じる (physical sensations), 気持ちする (emotional state)
example: I feel tired after the long trip. / 長い旅行後、疲れた気分です。

definition_en: Of or relating to the emotions.
example: She feels happy when she's with her friends. / 彼女は友人と一緒にいる時が楽しいという感じている。

definition_en: Anything that is found (usually valuable), as objects on an archeological site or a person with talent.
meanings_ja: 発見する (to discover or uncover), 探し出す (to search and find)
example: I found my favorite book on the shelf. / は、のFavoritebookをした。

definition_en: Fine champagne; French brandy.
example: The weather is fine today. / 今日は晴れです。

definition_en: The person or thing in the first position.
example: I finished my project first. / 私はプロジェクトを最初に完了した。

definition_en: The digit/figure 5.
example: I have five apples. / 私は5個のリンゴがあります。
I'm running for president. / 私は大統領に立候補しています。

definition_en: To lose remembrance of.
example: I forgot my phone at home. / 私の電話を家に置き忘れた。

"That's our favorite restaurant!" / "あれは私たちの好きなレストランです!"

**Meaning 2:** 少ない (sukanaishi) - limited or scarce in number or amount

definition_en: To resolve (a contest, problem, dispute, etc.); to choose, determine, or settle
example: I decided to take a break. / 私は休みを決心した。

definition_en: The act of deciding.
example: I need to make a decision about what to do tonight. / 今夜何をしようか決断する必要があります。

definition_en: At depth, in a deep way.
example: I think about her deeply. / 私は彼女についてすげん考えている。

definition_en: A stage of proficiency or qualification in a course of study, now especially an award bestowed by a university or, in some countries, a college, as a certification of academic achievement. (In the United States, can include secondary schools.)
example: The university offers degrees in engineering. / 大学は工学の学位を提供しています。

definition_en: A specification of an object or process, referring to requirements to be satisfied and thus conditions to be met for them to solve a problem.
meanings_ja: 考える (in a broader sense, e.g. designing one's life)
example: The company is redesigning their logo. / その会社はロゴを再設計しています。

definition_en: Something small enough to escape casual notice.
example: Can you provide more details about your project? / プロジェクトに関するより多くの仕様を教えてください。

definition_en: A theoretical line (physically or mentally) followed from a point of origin or towards a destination. May be relative (e.g. up, left, outbound, dorsal), geographical (e.g. north), rotational (e.g. clockwise), or with respect to an object or location (e.g. toward Boston).
example: The direction of the arrow is unclear. / 箭頭の向きは明確でない。

definition_en: One who directs; the person in charge of managing a department or directorate (e.g., director of engineering), project, or production (as in a show or film, e.g., film director).
meanings_ja: 映画やテレビ番組の製作責任者
企業や組織の最高責任者、リーダー
example: The director of the movie was praised for his creative work. / 映画の監督は創作的な仕事で称賛された。

definition_en: To sadden or displease (someone) by underperforming, or by not delivering something promised or hoped for.
example: I was disappointed by the movie. / 私は映画に楽しみがあった。

definition_en: To find or learn something for the first time.
example: Scientists discovered a new species of bird. / 科学者たちは新種の鳥を発見した。

definition_en: Conversation or debate concerning a particular topic.
meanings_ja: 談話、議論 (in a more formal or academic setting)
example: We had a long discussion about the project's timeline. / そのプロジェクトのスケジュールについて長い討論をしてみた。

definition_en: An abnormal condition of a human, animal or plant that causes discomfort or dysfunction; distinct from injury insofar as the latter is usually instantaneously acquired.
example: I caught a cold and had to stay home from work. / 私は風邪を捕らえ、仕事から居残なければならなかった。

definition_en: At a time in advance of the usual or expected event.
example: I need to leave earlier today. / 今日は早く出かける必要があります。

definition_en: The result or outcome of a cause.
example: The new policy will have a significant effect on the company's profits. / 新しいポリシーは会社の利益に大きな影響を与える。

definition_en: (after a negative) As well.
example: Do you want to go to the beach or stay at home? Either way is fine. / 海辺に行くか家でいても、どちらでも良い。

definition_en: To come to an end
meanings_ja: はじまることなく（副詞的）
example: The project ended last week. / プロジェクトは昨週終わった。

definition_en: The terminal point of something in space or time.
example: My goal is to ends this project successfully. / 私の目標はこのプロジェクトを成功的に終わらせることです。

definition_en: The surroundings of, and influences on, a particular item of interest.
meanings_ja: 環境問題, 質問 (環境に関する問題や質問)
example: The company is committed to preserving the environment. / その会社は自然環境を保護に尽力しています。

definition_en: The state, quality, or condition of being wrong.
example: The software had an error, so we couldn't use it. / ソフトウェアに誤りがあったため、私たちは使うことができなかった。

definition_en: (manner) In a special manner; specially.
example: I love playing tennis, especially on sunny days. / 日曜日は特にテニスが好きです。

definition_en: Alternative form of etc.
meanings_ja: その他、他にも (when emphasizing that there are more items or categories beyond what has been listed)
example: I like movies, books, etc. / 映画、書籍などが好きです。

definition_en: (diminutive) An even number.
meanings_ja: 簡単なこと、些細なこと (in a casual or informal sense, as in "even a child can do it")
example: The new policy applies even to small businesses. / 新しいポリシーは小規模のビジネスにも適用される。

definition_en: Occurring at any time, occurring even but once during a timespan.
example: I've always loved her, ever since we met. / 私は彼女をいつも愛してきた、私たちは出会ってからずっと

definition_en: (manner) without approximation; precisely.
example: I'll do exactly what you say. / 私はあなたが言うことを精々実行します。

definition_en: To stir the emotions of.
example: I'm excited for the concert tonight! / 今日のコンサートに大変楽しみです!

definition_en: (stative) to be; have existence; have being or reality
example: The company exists since 1990. / その会社は1990年からある。

definition_en: To predict or believe that something will happen
example: I expect to pass the exam. / 私は試験に合格することを期待します。

definition_en: To predict or believe that something will happen
meanings_ja: 望み (in a sense of anticipation or expectation)
example: The new employee was expected to start work on Monday. / 新入社員は来週月曜日に就業することが期待されました。

definition_en: (heading) To use or experience the sense of touch.
example: I have a good feeling about this project. / これらのプロジェクトについては、良好な感情がある。

definition_en: A drawing or diagram conveying information.
example: The company's financial figure was impressive. / その企業の財務は印象的でした。

definition_en: A final examination; a test or examination given at the end of a term or class; the test that concludes a class.
example: The final exam is crucial to my grade. / 私の成績を決める最終試験は大切です。

definition_en: Influenza.
meanings_ja: 熱病 (mainly referring to seasonal influenza)
example: I caught the flu and had to stay home from work. / インフルエンザを引いたため、仕事から帰らざるを得ない。

definition_en: (heading, physical) To do with shape.
example: The company has a specific form for job applications. / その会社には求職応募のための形式があります。

definition_en: Formalin.
example: The formal invitation to the wedding arrived yesterday. /昨日、結婚式の公式招待状が届いた。

definition_en: (heading, physical) To do with shape.
example: The company's forms were outdated. / その会社の形式は古い。

definition_en: One of the eight players (comprising two props, one hooker, two locks, two flankers and one number eight, collectively known as the pack) whose primary task is to gain and maintain possession of the ball (compare back).
example: I will forward your email to my team. / 私のチームにあなたのメールを送ります。

definition_en: The state of being free, of not being imprisoned or enslaved.
example: The protesters fought for their freedom to speak out against the government. / 政府に対する抗議に声を上げるための彼らの自由を争った。

definition_en: To help forward; to assist.
example: I'd like to further discuss this topic. / はこの話題についてやはり議論したいです。

definition_en: A general fact or proposition; a generality.
meanings_ja: 広範囲の, 一般的な
example: The company's general manager was pleased with the new policy. / その会社の総務長は、新しい政策に満足していた。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To move, shift, provide something abstract or concrete to someone or something or somewhere.
meanings_ja: 预想された, 預期される
example: The teacher gave the students a difficult assignment, which was given to her by the principal. / 教師は、部長から与えられた困難な課題を学生たちに与えた。
I'm gonna go to the store tonight. / 今夜、店に行くつもりです。

definition_en: The forces or behaviours that are the enemy of evil. Usually consists of helping others and general benevolence.
meanings_ja: 什物（モノ） - physical or tangible objects
物品（モンピン） - commodities or merchandise
example: The company specializes in exporting high-quality goods to Asia. / その会社はアジア向けに高品質の什物を輸出している。

definition_en: To deliver googlies.
example: I use Google to search for information. / 私は情報を検索するために Google を使う。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To obtain; to acquire.
example: I've gotten used to the new job. / 新しい仕事に慣れた。

definition_en: A number of things or persons being in some relation to one another.
meanings_ja: 部屋、グループ (in a computer context)
example: The company is divided into several groups to improve productivity. / その会社は生産性を向上させるために複数の部artmentに分かれています。

definition_en: To possess, own.
meanings_ja: 停止している, 到達している
example: I'm having a great time here. / ここはすごく楽しいです。

definition_en: (stative) To perceive sounds through the ear.
meanings_ja: 聞き取り (or) 審判 (if referring to a court hearing)
example: I had a hearing with my doctor yesterday. / 医者と面談した。

definition_en: To grasp or grip.
example: The company held a meeting to discuss the new policy. / その会社は、新しいポリシーを議論するために会合を開催した。

definition_en: Furnishing help; giving aid; useful.
example: The tutorial was very helpful. / 手習は非常に便りました。

definition_en: Very elevated; extending or being far above a base; tall; lofty.
example: The company's profits went higher last year. / その会社は去年の利益が高いとなった。

definition_en: To want something to happen, with a sense of expectation that it might.
meanings_ja: 希望する (to have a desire or wish)
example: I had hoped to finish the project by yesterday, but it's still not done. / 昨日にはまだ完成できなかったのに、希望していた。

definition_en: To want something to happen, with a sense of expectation that it might.
example: I have high hopes that I'll get the job. / 私はその仕事をゲットすることを大いに期待している。

definition_en: Very large.
example: The huge tree towered over the village. / その巨大な木は村を覆うように立っていた。

definition_en: A human being, whether man, woman or child.
example: Humans have the ability to think and reason. / 人間は思考と推理する能力を持つ。

definition_en: A human being, whether man, woman or child.
meanings_ja: 自然人 (referring to humans as biological organisms)
example: Humans have a natural ability to communicate. / 人類には自然的なコミュニケーションの能力があります。

definition_en: A hundred-dollar bill, or any other note denominated 100 (e.g. a hundred euros).
example: The company has hundreds of employees. / その会社は数百人の従業員がいる。

definition_en: The act of hunting.
example: I love going on a hunt with my friends in the woods. / 私は森で友達と一緒に猟りに行くことが大好きです。

definition_en: To make (something) better; to increase the value or productivity (of something).
example: I've been trying to improve my language skills. / 私は自分の言語能力を上向きにしている。

definition_en: In the place of something (usually mentioned earlier); as a substitute or alternative.
example: I'll go to the store instead of you. / 私はあなたの代わりに店に行く。

definition_en: An official face-to-face meeting of monarchs or other important figures.
example: The journalist conducted a thorough interview with the celebrity. / ジャーナリストは有名人と徹底的にインタビューを行った。

definition_en: (reflexive pronoun) it; A thing as the object of a verb or preposition that also appears as the subject
example: The company's success itself was a major factor in its growth. / その会社の成功は、その成長の大きな要因であった。

definition_en: A coarse mediaeval coat of defence, especially one made of leather.
meanings_ja: 類似の品種（e.g. jack bean, jack pine）
example: The sailor had to secure the jack of the ship / 舟のハンドルを固定する必要があった

definition_en: A chamber pot.
example: The Jerry had broken down on the highway. / 高速道路でトラブルになったトラックです。

definition_en: To connect or combine into one; to put together.
meanings_ja: 加わった (in an organization or activity)
example: The company joined forces with a rival to increase market share. / コンパニーは、競合会社と手を組み市場シェアを増やすために合流した。

definition_en: A set amount of travelling, seen as a single unit; a discrete trip, a voyage.
example: I'm on a journey to explore new cultures. / 私は、新しい文化を探す旅にいます。

meanings_ja: 男性の名前 (in some Latin American cultures)
example: The novel had 300 pages, including a juan that listed all the characters. / ノベルには、キャラクターの一覧を載せたページがあった。

definition_en: A public official whose duty it is to administer the law, especially by presiding over trials and rendering judgments; a justice.
example: The judge listened carefully to the evidence before making a decision. / 決定する者は、証拠を聞き終わってから判断を下しました。

definition_en: The main tower of a castle or fortress, located within the castle walls.
example: She keeps a diary every day. / 彼女は毎日日記を書く。

definition_en: (etc.) A set of keys used to operate a typewriter, computer etc.
example: I'm typing on my laptop's keyboard. / 私はノートパソコンのキーボードで入力しています。

definition_en: A heavy, pliable, inelastic metal element, having a bright, bluish color, but easily tarnished; both malleable and ductile, though with little tenacity. It is easily fusible, forms alloys with other metals, and is an ingredient of solder and type metal. Atomic number 82, symbol Pb (from Latin plumbum).
example: The company will lead the industry in innovation. / その会社はイノベーションで業界を先導する。

definition_en: Any person that leads or directs
example: The company's leader made a bold decision to expand into new markets. / その会社の指導者は、新しい市場に展開する勇敢な決断を下した。

definition_en: Having much learning, knowledgeable, erudite; highly educated.
meanings_ja: 約束のある知識を有する
example: She's a learned expert in the field of environmental science. / 彼女は環境科学の権威です。

definition_en: To acquire, or attempt to acquire knowledge or an ability to do something.
example: I'm in a learning process to improve my skills. / 私はスキルを向上させるための学習中です。

definition_en: Something of the smallest possible extent; an indivisible unit.
meanings_ja: かけがみなされるほどの
example: I will do my best to help you, at least. / 私はあなたに一番尽力して役立つようにします。

definition_en: A tool for finding whether a surface is level, or for creating a horizontal or vertical line of reference.
example: The new level of the video game is very challenging. / ゲームの新しいレベルは非常に難しい。
He has always lived his life to the fullest. /彼は常に完全に生きてきた。

definition_en: Something used for fastening, which can only be opened with a key or combination.
meanings_ja: 閉塞する (in a mechanical sense)
example: I need to lock my bike to secure it. / 自転車を鎖で固定する必要があります。

definition_en: Having much distance from one terminating point on an object or an area to another terminating point (usually applies to horizontal dimensions; see Usage Notes below).
meanings_ja: 時間的に長い, 適切な距離を持つ
example: The new highway is longer than the old one. / 新しい道路は古いより長くてある。

definition_en: Situated close to, or even below, the ground or another normal reference plane; not high or lofty.
example: The company will lower its prices to compete with rivals. / 会社はライバルの競争のため、価格を下げます。

definition_en: A device that directs and controls energy, often in the form of movement or electricity, to produce a certain effect.
meanings_ja: 製造設備 (in a broader sense)
example: The factory is running its machines around the clock. / ファクトリーは24時間機械を稼働しています。

definition_en: The act of forming, causing, or constituting; workmanship; construction.
meanings_ja: やること、すること (depending on the context)
example: I'm making a plan to travel. / 私は旅行計画をしています。

definition_en: A person whose job is to manage something, such as a business, a restaurant, or a sports team.
example: He's a great manager, he always meets his targets. / 彼は優秀な管理者で、常に目標を達する。

definition_en: An abstract representational system used in the study of numbers, shapes, structure, change and the relationships between these concepts.
example: The new mathematics curriculum emphasizes problem-solving skills. / 新しい数学カリキュラムでは問題解決能力を強調しています。

definition_en: Substance, material.
meanings_ja: 問題、問題点 (in a more abstract sense)
example: The matter of her departure was left unspoken. / 彼女の去る件は口止めで残された。

definition_en: One who officially belongs to a group.
meanings_ja: メンバー（特に、クラブや組織の意味）
example: The members of our team are working hard to finish the project. / 私たちのチームのメンバーがプロジェクトを完成させるために努力しています。

definition_en: The ability of the brain to record information or impressions with the facility of recalling them later at will.
example: The old photograph brought back memories of my childhood. / 元の写真は私の童年の思い出を呼んだ。

definition_en: Power, strength, force or influence held by a person or group.
example: The storm might cause damage to our building. / 嵐が我々の建物に損害を与えることがある。

definition_en: (long and short scales) The cardinal number 1,000,000: 106; a thousand thousand.
example: There are millions of stars in the galaxy. / 銀河には数多くの星がある。

definition_en: A person who serves as a subject for artwork or fashion, usually in the medium of photography but also for painting or drawing.
meanings_ja: ありうるモデル、パターン
example: The fashion models walked down the catwalk. / ファッションの人形が走り去った。

definition_en: To change place or posture; to go, in any manner, from one place or position to another.
meanings_ja: 感情的に動かされた (e.g. by a story or a performance)
example: The company moved its headquarters to a new location. / 会社は新しい所に本社を移転しました。

definition_en: A native inhabitant of a place, country etc.
example: The natural scenery of the park is beautiful. /公園の自然景色は美しい。

definition_en: (usually with the definite article) A place to do the "necessary" business of urination and defecation: an outhouse or lavatory.
example: It's necessary to wear a mask in public. / 公共でのマスク着用は必要です。

definition_en: To have an absolute requirement for.
example: I needed a new bike / 私には新しい自転車が欲しかった

definition_en: A thing that has physical existence.
example: The object of my study is to improve language skills. / 私の研究の目的は言語能力を向上させることです。

definition_en: (reflexive pronoun) Us; the group including the speaker as the object of a verb or preposition when that group also is the subject.
example: We have to take care of ourselves. / 我々は自分たちの自分を世話しなければならない。

definition_en: A portion; a component.
example: The car has many parts that need to be replaced. / 車には多くのパーツがあり、置き換える必要がある。

definition_en: A trail for the use of, or worn by, pedestrians.
example: The path to success is not always easy. / 成功の道は常に易しくない。

meanings_ja: (聖)パトリック（イギリスの守護聖人）
example: The boy's name is Patrick. / 彼の名前はパトリックです。

definition_en: (grammar) The perfect tense, or a form in that tense.
example: This cake is perfect. / このケーキは完璧です。

definition_en: A length of time.
example: The concert has a two-hour period. / コンサートは2時間の間である。

definition_en: A wit; a humorist; a buffoon.
example: The weather was pleasant today. / 今日の天気はすっきりした。

definition_en: A possible one.
example: Is it possible to attend the meeting tomorrow? / 明日会議に参加できるの?

definition_en: Ability to do or undergo something.
example: The company has the power to decide its own fate. / その会社には自らの運命を決める権力を持つ。

definition_en: Having, or capable of exerting power, potency or influence.
example: The new CEO is a powerful leader. / 新CEOは強いリーダーです。

definition_en: To be in the habit of choosing something rather than something else; to favor; to like better.
meanings_ja: 望む (主観的な好みを示す場合)
example: I prefer studying to watching TV. / 私は勉強するのをテレビを見るよりも好む。

definition_en: A soldier of the lowest rank in the army.
meanings_ja: 私的所有物、非公開情報
example: The company's financial reports are private. / その企業の財務報告書は非公開です。

definition_en: In all likelihood.
example: I think she'll come probably. / 彼女はほぼ来る。

definition_en: To yield, make or manufacture; to generate.
example: The farm produces fresh vegetables. / farmhouseで新鮮な野菜を作ります。

definition_en: The people in general, regardless of membership of any particular group.
example: The company's financial reports are made public every quarter. / コングラメーションの財務報告は、每四半期に一般に開示される。

definition_en: A right to sell something at a predetermined price.
example: She puts her phone on silent mode. / 彼女はフォンの静音モードに設定します。

definition_en: (heading) To the greatest extent or degree; completely, entirely.
example: The weather is quite nice today. /今日はかなり良い天気ですね。

definition_en: To prefer; to prefer to.
example: I'd rather stay home than go out tonight. / 私は今夜泊まる方がいいです。

definition_en: About, regarding, with reference to; especially in letters, documents and emails.
example: I'll re-apply to the job. / 私は職に再度申請します。

definition_en: To make real; to convert from the imaginary or fictitious into reality; to bring into real existence
meanings_ja: 実感する, 考え込む
example: I finally realized that I had to make a change. / 私は、自分が変化する必要があることにようやく分かった。

definition_en: A cause:
meanings_ja: 論理 (logical reason), 根本 (fundamental reason)
example: The company fired him without a good reason. / その会社は彼をいい理由なく解雇した。

definition_en: A cause:
example: I asked her why she was late, and she gave me several reasons. / 彼女が遅れた理由はいくつかあった。

definition_en: Having happened a short while ago.
example: The recent studies have shown significant progress. / 近年の研究は著しい進歩を示しています。

definition_en: In the recent past
example: I've been busy recently. / 私は最近忙しいです。

definition_en: A disk, usually made of a polymer, used to record sound for playback on a phonograph.
example: The band's new record is a huge hit. / バンドの新しい音盤は大ヒットです。

definition_en: To present again or anew; to present by means of something standing in the place of; to exhibit the counterpart or image of; to typify.
meanings_ja: 表彰する (to commend or praise)
example: The company will represent us at the meeting. / 会社は、私達を会議で代理します。

definition_en: Act of requesting (with the adposition at in the presence of possessives, and on in their absence).
example: Can I request a meeting? / 會議を許可してください。

definition_en: Diligent inquiry or examination to seek or revise facts, principles, theories, applications, etc.; laborious or continued search after truth.
meanings_ja: 探索 (in a broader sense, e.g. research on human behavior)
example: I'm conducting research on climate change. / 私は気候変化に関する研究を進めている。

definition_en: The act of returning.
example: "I need to return this book to the library." / "この本を図書館に返す必要があります。"

definition_en: To pronounce.
example: The company's saying is "customer first." / その会社の言葉は「顧客第一」です。

definition_en: A physical divider intended to block an area from view, or provide shelter from something dangerous.
example: The company will screen all job applicants. / その会社はすべての求人候補を選別します。

definition_en: An attempt to find something.
example: I've been searching for my lost keys all day. / 私は今日中ずっと私の失われたキーワードを探してきた。

definition_en: Something that is number two in a series.
meanings_ja: 次席の人 (in a hierarchical situation)
example: The timer started at 10 seconds. / 10秒から計時が始まりました。

definition_en: To appear; to look outwardly; to be perceived as.
example: The sunset seemed to last forever. / 夕焼けはとても長いようにあらわれた。

definition_en: (manner) In a serious or literal manner.
example: I'm seriously considering quitting my job. / 僕は仕事を辞めるのを本気で考えています。

definition_en: The status or condition of something
meanings_ja: 構成 (in a more abstract sense, such as the shape of an organization or a system)
example: The new policy will change the shape of our company's future. / 私会社の将来は新しい政策によって形状が変わる。

definition_en: The status or condition of something
example: The shapes of the puzzle pieces fit together perfectly. / パズルの駒の形がぴったり合う。

definition_en: A 45 RPM vinyl record with one song on side A and one on side B.
example: I'm looking for a single room to rent. / 私は一室を貸し合わせたいのです。

definition_en: A long-standing group of people sharing cultural aspects such as language, dress, norms of behavior and artistic forms.
example: The company has a diverse society. / その会社は多様な世帯を有している。

definition_en: (chiefly law enforcement) A solution; an explanation.
meanings_ja: 計算や謀略で解決する
example: Can you solve this math problem? / その数学の問題を解決できますか?

definition_en: Unspecified or unknown (unlocated) place or location.
example: I'm going to meet her somewhere downtown. / テレビで彼女と会うことにした。

definition_en: The state of moving quickly or the capacity for rapid motion; rapidity.
example: The new train has a high speed, so it can travel quickly from Tokyo to Osaka. / 新しい電車は高性能で、東京と大阪の間を早く移動できます。

definition_en: Amount of money spent (during a period); expenditure.
meanings_ja: 過ごす (in the context of leisure time)
example: She spends most of her free time reading books. / 彼女は、自由の時間を読書に費やす。

definition_en: To pay out (money).
meanings_ja: かけつけた (for money or resources)
example: I spent all my money on a new phone. / 私は新しい電話のために全額を使いました。

definition_en: (heading) To position or be positioned physically.
meanings_ja: 採用中 (in a state of being used or in use)
example: The new policy has been standing since last year. / 新しいポリシーは去年から立ち上がりしています。

definition_en: A condition; a set of circumstances applying at any given time.
example: The state of California is a major tourist destination. / カリフォルニア州は大きな観光地です。

definition_en: Something that is not crooked or bent such as a part of a road or track.
example: The road was straight and long. / 道は直線的で長い。

definition_en: An academic field of study concerning the given subject.
example: The university is known for its studies in marine biology. / 大学は海洋生物学の研究で知られている。

definition_en: Miscellaneous items or objects; (with possessive) personal effects.
example: I don't have much stuff in my new apartment, but it's starting to feel like home. / 私の新しいアパートはまだ物が少ないけど、既に感じるようになりました。

definition_en: Senses relating to a thin, pointed object.
example: Her style is simple yet elegant. / 彼女のモチーフは簡素ながら華やか。

definition_en: To follow in order; to come next after; hence, to take the place of.
example: I will succeed in my career. / 私は私のキャリアで成功する。

definition_en: The achievement of one's aim or goal.
example: I worked hard and achieved success in my career. / 私は努力してキャリアでの成功を実現した。

definition_en: Resulting in success; assuring, or promoting, success; accomplishing what was proposed; having the desired effect
example: The company was successful in increasing its sales this quarter. / その会社は今期の売り上げを増やすことに成功した。

definition_en: To imply but stop short of saying explicitly.
meanings_ja: 誘導する (in a subtle or indirect way)
example: The teacher suggested that I read the book. / 教師は私にその本を読むことを提案した。

definition_en: (sometimes attributive) Something which supports.
example: The company will provide support for its employees who are going through a difficult time. / その会社は、困難を経験している従業員に支援を提供します。

definition_en: A collection of organized things; a whole composed of relationships among its members.
example: The company has a system in place to handle customer complaints. / その会社には顧客の不満に対処する計画があります。

definition_en: To get into one's hands, possession or control, with or without force.
meanings_ja: 採用された (in this sense, it means "selected" or "chosen")
example: The job was taken by someone else. / その仕事はsomeone elseに取られた。

definition_en: To get into one's hands, possession or control, with or without force.
meanings_ja: 行為的に取り組む (this meaning is less common)
example: I'm taking a course to improve my language skills. / 私は言語能力を向上させるためにコースを受講しています。

definition_en: A piece of work done as part of one’s duties.
example: What's your task for today? / 今日の任務は何ですか?

definition_en: A set of draught animals, such as two horses in front of a carriage.
example: Our company has several teams working on different projects. / 我々の会社には、異なるプロジェクトに取り組む複数のチームがあります。

definition_en: The organization of knowledge for practical purposes.
meanings_ja: 科学技術, 情報化技術
example: The company invested heavily in technology to improve its manufacturing process. / その会社は製造プロセスを改善するために技術投資した。

definition_en: That which limits the extent of anything; limit, extremity, bound, boundary.
meanings_ja: 用語 (学術やビジネスで用いられる特殊な用語)
example: The company will review your application in a 6-month term. / その会社はあなたの申請を6ヶ月の期間内にレビューします。
The city has thousands of residents. / この都市には多くの住民がいます。

definition_en: A mechanical device intended to make a task easier.
example: This software includes a set of useful tools for editing images. / このソフトウェアにはイメージの編集用に有効なツールが含まれています。

definition_en: A mark left by something that has passed along.
meanings_ja: 印刷物の目次 (in the context of a printed book or document)
example: The train will be on track by tomorrow. / てんはあしたに路線になります。

definition_en: An ordered tree data structure that is used to store an associative array where the keys are usually strings.
example: He tries to solve the puzzle. / 彼はパズルを解くことを試す。

definition_en: To attempt; to endeavour. Followed by infinitive.
example: I'm trying to learn Japanese. / 私は日本語を学んでいます。

definition_en: (heading) to make a non-linear physical movement.
example: The road takes many turns before reaching the top. / 山頂に到達するには、道が複数の回転を踏む必要があります。

definition_en: An occurrence of the interjection "uh".
meanings_ja: やや（驚きや疑問の感情）
example: "Uh, what time is it?" / 「何時ですか？」

definition_en: To grasp a concept fully and thoroughly, especially (of words, statements, art, etc.) to be aware of the meaning of and (of people) to be aware of the intent of.
example: She understands my feelings. / 彼女は私の感情を理解する。

definition_en: Up to the time of (something happening).
meanings_ja: その時まで, その点まで (depending on the context)
example: I'll stay here until tomorrow / あしたのようになるまでここにいる

definition_en: Having a practical or beneficial use.
example: This software is useful for editing photos. / これらのソフトウェアは写真の編集に有効です。

definition_en: To utilize or employ.
example: I'm using my phone to check emails. / 私はスマートフォンでメールをチェックしています。

definition_en: An elongated depression between hills or mountains, often with a river flowing through it.
example: The hikers climbed up the mountain and reached a beautiful valley. / 山を登り、美しい谷を見た。

definition_en: The quality (positive or negative) that renders something desirable or valuable.
meanings_ja: 物価（ぶちか） - Refers to the price or value of something.
優先順位（yūsenjun'i） - Refers to the importance or priority given to something.
example: The company places a high value on innovation. / その会社はイノベーションに高い優先順位を置く。

definition_en: A covered vehicle used for carrying goods or people, usually roughly cuboid in shape, longer and higher than a car but smaller than a truck/lorry.
meanings_ja: Small truck or box-like vehicle used for carrying goods or people
example: I rented a van to move my furniture. / 私は家具を移動するためにレンタルしたバンを借りました。

definition_en: (physical) Visual perception.
example: The new policy has changed our company's view on employee benefits. / 会社の従業員向けの福利厚生に対するみんなの目線が変わった。

definition_en: To delay movement or action until the arrival or occurrence of; to await. (Now generally superseded by “wait for”.)
meanings_ja: じまんの状態 (state of waiting)
example: I'm waiting for my friends at the station. / ステーションで友達を待ってる。

definition_en: Lacking in force (usually strength) or ability.
example: The weak signal was hard to receive. / 弱い信号は受信するのが難しかった。

definition_en: The World Wide Web.
meanings_ja: インターネット（主要な意味）
example: The company has a strong web presence. / その会社は強いウェブ・プレゼンスを持つ。

definition_en: (physical) Matter, material.
example: The weight of the package was too heavy. / パッケージの重さは太くて無理だった。

definition_en: Unexceptional or unimportant; blah.
example: I'll do whatever you want. / 私はあなたの望むようにする。

definition_en: Which of two.
meanings_ja: 「(shika)」 - indicating a choice between two alternatives
「(yarikirenai toki wa)」 - implying uncertainty or doubt
example: I don't know whether I'll go to the party tonight. / (kono yoru, pātī ni iku ka, shiranai)

definition_en: An uncertain duration of time, a period of time.
example: I'll study while you watch TV. / 私はTVを見ている間に勉強します。

definition_en: Something complete, without any parts missing.
example: The company wants to make the whole process more efficient. / その会社はプロセスを完全に効率化することを目指す。

definition_en: Outside, externally. This is still used in the names of some civil parishes in England, e.g. St Cuthbert Without.
example: I'm going to the movie without you / わたしはあなたと一緒に映画に行くことなく行く

definition_en: (heading) Employment.
meanings_ja: 作品 (in the context of art or literature)
example: The new factory's works have improved significantly. / 新工場の作業は著しく改善した。

definition_en: Value.
meanings_ja: 責任がある, 価値あり
example: This new employee is worth investing in. / この新入社員は投資に値打ちしている。

definition_en: To form letters, words or symbols on a surface in order to communicate.
meanings_ja: 書かれた、記述された (in a broader sense)
example: The letter was written in red ink. / 赤いインクで手書きされた手紙です。

definition_en: (usually with negative) Thus far; up to the present; up to some specified time; still
example: I've never traveled to Europe, yet I've always wanted to go. / 私はヨーロッパに行ったことがないのに、行ってみたいと思っている。

definition_en: An abridgement or summary of a longer publication.
example: The abstract artist created a beautiful, non-figurative sculpture. / 非実体的な彫刻を作ったアブストレクト・アーティストは美しい作品を創造した。

definition_en: To cause to move faster; to quicken the motion of; to add to the speed of.
meanings_ja: 促進された (in certain contexts, such as business or science)
example: The company's accelerated growth was due to its innovative marketing strategy. / コンパニーの加速された成長は、革新的マーケティング戦略によるものであった。

definition_en: To get.
example: The company acquired a new subsidiary last year. / その会社は昨年、新しい子会社を取得した。

definition_en: The act or process of acquiring.
example: The company made a significant acquisition last year. / その会社は去年大きな物件を取得した。

definition_en: To encourage development or induce increased activity; to stimulate.
example: The software needs to be activated before it can be used. / ソフトウェアは使用する前に起動しなければならない。

definition_en: Deserving of the highest esteem or admiration.
example: She's an admirable person. / 彼女は優秀な人です。

meanings_ja: 上昇の様子 (in a graph or chart)
example: The company's profits have an agi of 10% each year. / その会社は各年10%の上昇を示す。

definition_en: A type of three-toed sloth, Bradypus tridactylus, endemic to forests of southern Venezuela, the Guianas, and northern Brazil.
meanings_ja: アルトゥインテレクション
example: AI is revolutionizing healthcare. / メディカル分野でAIが革命的に役立つ。

definition_en: Denotes a mingling or intermixing with distinct or separable objects. See usage note at amidst.
example: The company is struggling amongst the economic downturn. / 会社は経済的ダウンターンの中で苦境に立つ。

definition_en: A robot that is designed to look and act like a human being (not necessarily male)
meanings_ja: Googleのモバイルオペレーティングシステム
example: The new android phone is very popular. / 新しいAndroidスマートフォンは非常に人気です。

meanings_ja: 計算プログラムのインターフェース
ソフトウェアの機能を提供するインターフェース
example: The app uses the API to access weather data. / アプリケーションは、天気情報にアクセスするためにAPIを使用しています。

definition_en: Something or someone of any value; any portion of one's property or effects so considered.
example: The company's assets include cash, property, and equipment. / その会社の財産には現金、建物、機器などが含まれています。

definition_en: The act of assuming, or taking to or upon oneself; the act of taking up or adopting.
example: The company's success was based on several assumptions, but they turned out to be incorrect. / その会社の成功は、数々の前提条件に基づいていたが、実際には誤っていた。

definition_en: To ascribe (something) to a given cause, reason etc.
meanings_ja: 付与される (in a more formal or academic context)
example: The award was attributed to her hard work. / 奨賞は彼女の努力に帰せられた。

definition_en: The quality of being available.
meanings_ja: 供給の可否 (depending on the context)
example: The availability of the new product is limited. / 新製品の使用可能な状態は限られている。
The ancient basian culture had a strong influence on modern society. / 古典的古文化は現代社会に強い影響を与えた。

definition_en: Inclination towards something; predisposition, partiality, prejudice, preference, predilection.
example: The study showed a bias against minorities in job hiring. / 少数民族に対する就業における偏見が明らかになった。

definition_en: A product of the biomedicine industry.
example: The new biomedical device has revolutionized medical treatment. / 新しい生体医科学デバイスは、医療処置を革新した。

definition_en: The larva of a botfly, which infests the skin of various mammals, producing warbles, or the nasal passage of sheep, or the stomach of horses.
meanings_ja: ウェブスクロールプログラム (in the context of web scraping)
example: The bot helped me with my online shopping. / ボットがオンラインショッピングに助けました。
The wine was aged in a Brett barrel. / ワインはブレット樽で熟成された。

definition_en: A heretic.
meanings_ja: (gurāma) - informal term for a foolish or annoying person
example: "That bugger is always late!" / "その Gurāma はいつも遅れる！"
The spaceship passed bym Mars. / 宇宙船は火星を通過した。

definition_en: A disease in which the cells of a tissue undergo uncontrolled (and often rapid) proliferation.
example: The treatment was successful in curing her breast cancer. / がん治療は彼女の乳がんで成功した。

definition_en: Relating to the circulatory system, that is the heart and blood vessels.
example: The doctor examined my cardiovascular health. / 医者は私の心血管系の健康状態を検査しました。

definition_en: (physical) To move, or be moved, away.
meanings_ja: 模造、偽物 (in a negative sense)
example: The actor's casting as Hamlet was impressive. / 俳優のハムレット役は印象的でした。

definition_en: A systematic list of names, books, pictures etc.
meanings_ja: 繁殖表 (生物学や経済などでの使用)
example: The company released a new product catalog. / その会社は新製品の類書を発売しました。

definition_en: (grammar) a word (such as because) that expresses a reason or a cause
meanings_ja: 関連する、連携する (in a statistical sense)
example: The causal link between smoking and lung cancer is well established. / te smokingと肺がんとの関連は明確にある。

definition_en: To cause (an object) to occupy the center of an area.
example: The teacher wants students to be centered in their thoughts, not distracted. / 教師は、学生が自分の考えに集中していて、邪魔されないようにしたい。
The chasht of the earthquake was unpredictable. / 地震は予測不能だった。

meanings_ja: チャイルド（子供の状態）
example: The child is sleeping. / 子供は寝ています。

definition_en: A task, especially a difficult, unpleasant, or routine one.
meanings_ja: 手間取ること (additional or routine task)
example: I have a lot of chores to do today. / 今日はたくさんの仕事が待ってる。

meanings_ja: ウィンチャースター（政治家）
example: Churchill was a renowned statesman. / チャーチルは名誉ある政治家である。
The CEO is Mr. Clark / CEOsはクラーク氏です。

meanings_ja: クロード（ Claude Monet の芸名）
クレーデュール（法的概念、所有権）
example: The famous painting "Water Lilies" was created by Claude. / クロードの有名な絵画「水仙」が描かれた。

definition_en: To write software programs.
meanings_ja: プログラミングの行為
example: I'm good at coding, so I can finish this project quickly. / 私はコードの作成が上手く、早くこのプロジェクトを完了できます。

definition_en: (of two or more things, people, concepts, etc.) To exist contemporaneously or in the same area.
example: The two cultures coexist peacefully. / 二つの文化は平和的に共存しています。

definition_en: The state of two or more things existing together, usually in a temporal or spatial sense, with or without mutual interaction.
example: Humans and animals coexist in harmony. / 人間と動物は調和のある共存しています。

definition_en: A Jewish priest: direct male descendant of the Biblical high priest Aaron, brother of Moses.
example: The cohen is a renowned literary scholar. / 文献学者として知られる彼は、著名な研究者です。

definition_en: The act of collapsing.
example: The company's collapse was due to financial mismanagement. / その会社は金銭的ミス管理により突然崩壊した。

definition_en: A farm owned by a collection of people
example: The collective efforts of the team led to their success. / チームのまとまった努力が彼らの成功に繋がった。
The car had a collision with another vehicle on the highway. / 高速道路で車両との衝突がありました。

definition_en: One who compiles.
example: The company developed a new compiler to improve code efficiency. / その会社はコードの効率を改善するために新しいコンパイラを開発した。

definition_en: The state or condition of being complete
example: The new software package achieved completeness in its latest update. / 新しいソフトウェアパッケージは最新のアップデートで完全性を実現した。

definition_en: The state of being complex; intricacy; entanglement.
meanings_ja: 多くの要素を持つ状況 (this meaning is often used in technical or scientific contexts)
example: The company's complexity made it difficult to understand their financial reports. / その会社の複雑さにより、財務報告書を理解するのが難しくなった。

definition_en: A smaller, self-contained part of a larger entity. Often refers to a manufactured object that is part of a larger device.
example: The new smartphone has many components that make it more efficient. / スマートフォンはより効率的にするために多くの部品を持つ。

definition_en: The thought process of considering, of taking multiple or specified factors into account (with of being the main corresponding adposition).
example: The company took into account all considerations before making a decision. / 会社は、決定する前に一切の考慮を踏み台にしました。

definition_en: The act or state of continuing or being continued; uninterrupted extension or succession
example: The novel's continuation was eagerly anticipated by fans. / 小説の続編はファンの期待に応えるよう待たれていた。

definition_en: The act or state of continuing or being continued; uninterrupted extension or succession
example: The sequel is a continuation of the original story. / 元のストーリーの続きが描かれる。

definition_en: A firmly held belief.
example: She held a strong conviction that environmental protection was important. / 彼女は環境保護が重要なことを強く信じておりました。

meanings_ja: コニー・ワイアンド（ Conwy Bayの名前）
example: John Conway was a famous mathematician. / ジョン・コンワーは有名な数学者です。

definition_en: To synchronize (activities).
example: The company is coordinating with suppliers to meet the demand. / その会社は需要に応じて供給者と協力しています。

definition_en: The central part of fruit, containing the kernels or seeds.
example: The core of the company's success lies in its strong leadership. / その会社の成功の要は強いリーダーシップにあります。
The corpa has announced a new project. / その企業体は、新しいプロジェクトを発表した。

definition_en: (mildly) Of very poor quality; unpleasant; distasteful.
example: This restaurant is crappy. / このレストランはあまり良くない。

definition_en: (usually affectionate) A creature, an animal.
meanings_ja: 小さな動物 (in a general sense)
example: The critter scurried across the floor. / 床に小さな動物が駆け回った。

definition_en: The middle tone in either one of the sets of seven white keys on a keyboard or a set of seven strings on a stringed instrument.
meanings_ja: コンピューター・サイエンス（Computer Science）
コンピューターサポート（Computer Support）
example: I'm taking a CS course to improve my programming skills. / 私はプログラミングスキルを向上させるため、CSのコースを受講しています。

definition_en: To restore to health.
meanings_ja: 変革された (in a positive sense)
example: The new medicine was cured of my illness. / 新しい薬が私の病気を治療した。

definition_en: A part of any of several scientific instruments that moves back and forth to indicate a position
meanings_ja: カーソルのように移動する箇所
example: The cursor moved to the end of the sentence. / 文章の末尾にカーソルが移動した。

meanings_ja: フィギュアスケート選手（Dario Salvini）
example: The car's driver was speeding down the highway. / 車のドライバーは高速道路を疾走していた。

definition_en: A panel under the windscreen of a motor car or aircraft, containing indicator dials, compartments, and sometimes controls.
meanings_ja: 車内パネル (mainly used in the context of cars)
example: The company's dashboard showed a significant increase in sales. / その会社の計算盤には、売り上げが著しく増加していることが示されました。

definition_en: (general) A collection of (usually) organized information in a regular structure, usually but not necessarily in a machine-readable format accessible by a computer.
meanings_ja: 情報の集まり、データの保存場所
example: The company uses a database to store customer information. / 会社は顧客情報をデータベースに保存しています。

definition_en: The action, or a session, of reviewing source code to find and eliminate errors.
example: The programmer spent hours debugging the code. / プログラマーはコードを調整して何時間も費やした。

definition_en: To determine with precision; to mark out with distinctness; to ascertain or exhibit clearly.
meanings_ja: 決定的な (in a mathematical or logical sense)
example: The company's mission statement is defining its identity. / その企業のミッションステートメントは、そのアイデンティティを決定しています。

definition_en: A person or entity engaged in the creation or improvement of certain classes of products.
example: The company is looking for talented developers to create a new app. / 会社は、新しいアプリケーションを作成する才能あるソフトウェア開発者を探しています。

definition_en: A variety of a language that is characteristic of a particular area, community or social group, differing from other varieties of the same language in relatively minor ways as regards grammar, phonology, and lexicon.
example: The regional dialects in Japan have many differences. / 日本各地の地方言葉には多くの違いがある。

definition_en: An order or command.
example: The boss dictates the company's policies. / ボスは会社の政策を指示します。

definition_en: Not to have the same traits or characteristics; to be unalike or distinct.
meanings_ja: ぶれていた (in a past context)
example: The project timelines differed by several weeks. / プロジェクトのスケジュールは数週間違っていた。

definition_en: A single aspect of a given thing.
meanings_ja: 項目, 分野 (in a broader sense)
example: The company has expanded its dimension into the Asian market. / その会社はアジア市場まで展開した。

definition_en: To make ineligible for something.
example: The athlete was disqualified from the competition due to doping. / 運動員はドーピングにより競技から除かれた。

definition_en: That which distinguishes; a single occurrence of a determining factor or feature, the fact of being divided; separation, discrimination.
example: The new policy has several distinctions from the previous one. / 新しいポリシーは前のそれより多くの区別点を持つ。

definition_en: To divide into portions and dispense.
meanings_ja: 回収された（コンピュータ上での意味）
example: The company's profits are distributed among its employees. / その会社の利益は従業員に分けられる。

definition_en: The part of a living being that carries genetic information.
meanings_ja: ドナ（デオキシリボ核酸）
example: The DNA test proved that the twins were identical. / 双子のDNA検査で、双子は同一のものであることがわかりました。

definition_en: A geographic area owned or controlled by a single person or organization.
meanings_ja: ジャーナリズムの分野、領域
example: The company has expanded its domain into the Asian market. / その会社はアジア市場に展開した。

definition_en: A geographic area owned or controlled by a single person or organization.
meanings_ja: 属する領域 (in a broader sense)
example: The company has several domains to manage. / その会社にはいくつかのコード領域を管理する。

definition_en: To pronounce sentence or judgment on; to condemn.
meanings_ja: 無可避の敗北 (複数の意味がある場合は、このように2つを挙げました)
example: The city was doomed from the moment the earthquake hit. / その瞬間に市は運命のくれない状態になった。

definition_en: A disadvantageous aspect of something that is normally advantageous.
example: The company's downsides are high production costs and limited market share. / その会社の不利な点は生産コストが高く、マーケットシェアも限られる。

definition_en: A male ant, bee or wasp, which does not work but can fertilize the queen bee.
meanings_ja: ドローンスピーカー (in music)
example: The new drones are being used to survey the forest. / 新しい無人航空機は森林の調査に使用されています。

definition_en: A durable thing, one useful over more than one period, especially a year.
example: This bike is durable enough for daily use. / この自転車は、日常使用に耐える程の耐久性があります。

definition_en: A house or place in which a person lives; a habitation, a home.
example: The family moved into their new dwelling. / 家族は新しい家に引っ越しました。

definition_en: A characteristic or manner of an interaction; a behavior.
meanings_ja: 変化の激しい、活気のある
example: The dynamic speaker got everyone's attention. / 大勢を引きつけるような速くて力強いスピーカーである。

definition_en: An expert in economics, especially one who studies economic data and extracts higher-level information or proposes theories.
meanings_ja: 財務専門家 (mainly referring to a professional economist)
example: The economist studied the impact of government policies on the economy. / 政治の政策が経済に与える影響を研究する economics学者。

definition_en: A system formed by an ecological community and its environment that functions as a unit.
example: The forest is a delicate ecosystem that requires careful management to maintain its health. / 森は、健康を維持するために注意深く管理する必要がある敏感な自然環境です。

definition_en: A system formed by an ecological community and its environment that functions as a unit.
example: The forest ecosystem is crucial to the survival of many species. / 森の生態系は多くの種類の存続に必要です。

definition_en: Without effort.
example: She did the puzzle effortlessly. / 彼女はやさしくパズルを解いた。
Albert Einstein was a renowned physicist. / アルバート・アイゼンシュタインは有名な物理学者です。

definition_en: A diminutive of the pale, usually appearing in pairs on either side of a pale.
example: The company endorses the new policy. / その会社、新しい政策を支持している。

definition_en: To continue or carry on, despite obstacles or hardships; to persist.
example: Despite the challenges, she was determined to endure the grueling training. / その挑戦にもかかわらず、彼女は厳しいトレーニングを耐えることを決意した。

definition_en: To continue or carry on, despite obstacles or hardships; to persist.
example: I endured the long flight to get to my destination. / 私は長い飛行で目的地に到着するために苦労を耐えた。

definition_en: To lift, raise up.
meanings_ja: 強化された (in a physical sense, e.g. muscle growth)
example: The athlete's enhanced physique allowed him to compete at a higher level. / アスリートの強化された体躯は、高レベルの競技に競争できた。

definition_en: Improvement.
example: The new software features an enhancement to improve data processing speed. / 新しいソフトウェアには、データ処理速度を向上させるための機能があります。

definition_en: With zealous fervor; excited, motivated.
example: She's very enthusiastic about her new job. / 彼女は新しい仕事について非常に熱烈です。

definition_en: That which has a distinct existence as an individual unit. Often used for organisations which have no physical form.
example: The entity was a large corporation. / それは大きな企業だった。

definition_en: Anything that escalates.
example: I got on the escalator to get to the top floor. / 最上階に到達するためにエスカレーターに乗った。

definition_en: A change of position.
meanings_ja: 変化、変革 (in a broader sense, referring to changes over time)

definition_en: The subject of an experiment.
example: The company is conducting an experimental new product test. / その会社は新製品の実験的テストを行っています。

definition_en: The act of experimenting; practice by experiment.
example: The company will conduct thorough experimentation to improve its product. / その会社は製品を改良するために徹底した実験を行う。

definition_en: To conduct an experiment.

definition_en: The condition of being exposed, uncovered, or unprotected.

definition_en: In an extraordinary manner.

definition_en: Pertaining to or consisting of objective claims.

definition_en: A repair or corrective action.
example: The company's fixes to the software finally resolved the issue. / その会社はソフトウェアの問題を解決するための修理を行った。

definition_en: The quality of being flexible; suppleness; pliability.

meanings_ja: はじき上げた (in a game or competition)
example: The teacher flipped the coin to decide which team would play first. / 教師は先にプレイするチームを決めるためにコインを逆さまにした。

definition_en: The elements of an image which lie closest to the picture plane.
example: The singer stood in the foreground of the stage. / 舞台の前面に歌手が立った。

definition_en: First, either in time or in space

The company will forjac its outdated software. / その企業は古いソフトウェアを廃止する。

definition_en: Forward in time, place or degree.
example: The company will go forth with a new project. / その会社は新しいプロジェクトを始める。

definition_en: One who founds or establishes (especially said of a company, project, organisation, state)
example: The founders of the company were two college friends. / その会社の創立者は、2人の大学友だった。

definition_en: A support structure comprising joined parts or conglomerated particles and intervening open spaces of similar or larger size.
example: The company will use this new framework to improve their business strategy. / その会社はこの新しい基盤を事業戦略の改善に使うつもりです。

definition_en: A support structure comprising joined parts or conglomerated particles and intervening open spaces of similar or larger size.
meanings_ja: ソフトウェアライブラリー (software library)
example: We developed a new framework to improve project management. / 我々はプロジェクトマネジメントを改善するために、新しい基盤構造を開発した。

definition_en: A function that takes a function as its argument; More precisely: A function y=f(x) whose argument x varies in a space of (real valued, complex valued) functions and whose value belongs to a monodimensional space. An example: the definite integration of integrable real functions in a real interval.
example: The new software is functional on most computers. / 新しいソフトウェアは多くのコンピューターで機能的です。

definition_en: The act of gaining; acquisition.

The country's GDP grew significantly last year. / この国の国内総生産は去年大幅に増加した。

definition_en: A rank in the classification of organisms, below family and above species; a taxon at that rank.

example: The study analyzed the genes responsible for the development of the disease. / 病気の発症に絡む遺伝子を分析した。

I love trying new gooies at the fair. / フェアで新しい gooies を試すのが大好きです。

definition_en: A potential problem or source of trouble.

The crowd erupted in a loud "hu" as the team scored. / クロウドはチームがスコアした際、「不満の音」で大騒ぎになった。

meanings_ja: ハンティントン大学 (Columbia University's Huntington Library and Archive)

ブラウザ上で動作するスクリプト言語

meanings_ja: artificial intelligence (AI) model that uses large-scale machine learning

meanings_ja: データベースソフトウェア
